description: Update a project phase revenue item.
permissions: Authorization is delegated to the related project phase (project_phase).
side_effects: Updates specified fields of a project phase revenue item.
validation_notes: At least one update flag must be provided. --quantity-strategy must be one of: direct, indirect. --project-revenue-classification and --quantity-estimate accept an empty string to clear the relationship; --note accepts an empty string to clear the note. project_revenue_classification must be a child of the revenue classification of the revenue item. project_revenue_classification must belong to the same broker as the project. quantity_estimate must be related to the project phase revenue item.

flags.name: --project-revenue-classification
flags.description: Update project revenue classification ID (empty to clear)

flags.name: --quantity-strategy
flags.validation: Must be one of: direct, indirect.

flags.name: --quantity-estimate
flags.description: Update quantity estimate ID (empty to clear)
